settings.html: Experience the power of reliability and precision with the Dell Precision 5820 Workstation, designed to meet the demanding needs of radiologists and healthcare professionals. Crafted with a commitment to excellence and equipped with essential features, this workstation offers a compelling blend of capabilities without resorting to exaggerated claims or hype.

settings.title: Reliability Where it Matters Most
settings.content: Ensure a safe and secure computing experience with Dell Reliable Memory Technology (RMT) Pro, a robust system that collaborates with memory to prevent potential crashes by identifying and isolating bad memory locations during system reboots. Mitigate downtime risks and reliably access data through versatile hardware and software RAID storage options, including PCIe NVMe SSDs. Take control of system access with optional Smart Card (CAC/PIV) readers, allowing you to manage and ascertain authorized personnel. Dell prioritizes data integrity and system security, providing users with a comprehensive solution that not only safeguards against disruptions but also empowers control over access to critical information.

settings.title: Reliability Where it Matters Most
settings.description: Ensure a safe and secure computing experience with Dell Reliable Memory Technology (RMT) Pro, a robust system that collaborates with memory to prevent potential crashes by identifying and isolating bad memory locations during system reboots. Mitigate downtime risks and reliably access data through versatile hardware and software RAID storage options, including PCIe NVMe SSDs. Take control of system access with optional Smart Card (CAC/PIV) readers, allowing you to manage and ascertain authorized personnel. Dell prioritizes data integrity and system security, providing users with a comprehensive solution that not only safeguards against disruptions but also empowers control over access to critical information.

settings.title: Powerful performance
settings.description:
The Precision 5820 is powered by the latest Intel Core i-series processors. This makes them ideal for demanding medical imaging and diagnostic applications, such as:

3D image rendering: The Precision 5820 can quickly and accurately render complex 3D images, which can help radiologists to better visualize and understand patient anatomy.

Real-time image analysis: The Precision 5820 can perform real-time image analysis, which can help radiologists to guide minimally invasive procedures and provide immediate feedback.

Advanced image processing: The Precision 5820's advanced image processing capabilities can help radiologists to improve the accuracy of their diagnoses.

settings.title: Manage and Secure with Ease
settings.description:
Enhance convenience with Dell Client Command Suite and VMware® Workspace ONE™ integration, which lets you manage all of your Windows 10 endpoints from one console.

Enjoy peace of mind with SafeGuard and Response, tools backed by security exports that protect your workstation from cyber threats, and allow you to focus your energy on your workflow.

Manage systems remotely with Dell unique vPro extensions, capable of remotely running diagnostics on a fleet of devices, regardless of if they are powered on or off.

settings.title: Intelligence that Matches Yours
settings.description: Experience a heightened level of productivity with Dell Optimizer for Precision, an integrated AI platform that learns and adapts to your work style for a personalized experience. This sophisticated system, incorporating AI and Intel Adaptix Technology, dynamically adjusts performance levels to optimize efficiency where it matters most. Launch frequently used applications swiftly, thanks to intelligent performance enhancements tailored to your preferences. Dell Optimizer for Precision transforms your workflow into a smarter and more responsive environment, showcasing the power of adaptive technology. Enjoy the benefits of a seamlessly personalized experience that not only saves time but also enhances your overall efficiency, making every interaction with your Precision workstation a step towards a more productive and intuitive work routine.

settings.title: Reliability Where it Matters Most
settings.description: Ensure a safe and secure computing experience with Dell Reliable Memory Technology (RMT) Pro, a robust system that collaborates with memory to prevent potential crashes by identifying and isolating bad memory locations during system reboots. Mitigate downtime risks and reliably access data through versatile hardware and software RAID storage options, including PCIe NVMe SSDs. Take control of system access with optional Smart Card (CAC/PIV) readers, allowing you to manage and ascertain authorized personnel. Dell prioritizes data integrity and system security, providing users with a comprehensive solution that not only safeguards against disruptions but also empowers control over access to critical information.

settings.title: Precision Unleashed: Custom-Built Workstations for You
settings.description: Unlock the full potential of your workstation by customizing it to your precise specifications. Whether you require upgraded storage, expanded memory, or advanced graphics cards, we offer tailored solutions. Reach out to us with your specific requirements, and our team will promptly provide you with a detailed quote for a custom-configured solution that aligns perfectly with your needs. Our commitment to customization ensures that you get the performance, capacity, and features you demand, allowing your workstation to evolve with your work demands. Elevate your computing experience by personalizing your workstation, and let us assist you in creating a high-performance system that caters to your unique professional requirements.

settings.title: Precision Unleashed: Custom-Built Workstations for You
settings.description: Unlock the full potential of your workstation by customizing it to your precise specifications. Whether you require upgraded storage, expanded memory, or advanced graphics cards, we offer tailored solutions. Reach out to us with your specific requirements, and our team will promptly provide you with a detailed quote for a custom-configured solution that aligns perfectly with your needs. Our commitment to customization ensures that you get the performance, capacity, and features you demand, allowing your workstation to evolve with your work demands. Elevate your computing experience by personalizing your workstation, and let us assist you in creating a high-performance system that caters to your unique professional requirements.

settings.title: Blazing Fast Performance
settings.description: Power your most demanding applications with the latest Intel Xeon processor, now featuring a new generation of single-socket architecture with up to 18 cores. Run your software as fast as possible and get real-time results thanks to this memory-expandable machine with up to 64GB of 2666MHz RDIMM memory (not available with Core X CPUs).

settings.title: Built for Your Future
settings.description: The Precision 5820 has a new customizable chassis that combines a versatile design with outstanding storage scalability to grow with your setup needs. No problem is too big with up to six 2.5" or five 3.5" drives and front access storage including SATA, SAS (not available on systems with Core X CPUs) and PCIe M.2/U.2 NVMe SSD can be configured for up to 1TB total storage and easily swapped. With the hot-swap feature on the M.2 and U.2 PCIe NVMe SSDs, you can remove drives without shutting down the workstation.

settings.title: Intelligence that Matches Yours
settings.description: Increase your productivity with Dell Optimizer for Precision, an AI platform that adapts to your work style. By using AI and Intel Adaptix Technology, it adjusts performance to boost efficiency where needed most. Frequently used applications launch faster, thanks to intelligent enhancements tailored to your preferences. Dell Optimizer transforms your workflow into a smarter, more responsive environment, providing a personalized experience that saves time and enhances efficiency, making your Precision workstation more productive and intuitive.

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.description:
The Dell 5820 Workstation Tower features a compact design, measuring efficiently, with dimensions and weight optimized for workspace versatility.

1. Width: 6.95" (176.5 mm)

2. Depth: 20.4" (518.2 mm)

3. Height: 16.45" (418 mm)

Weight: 34 lbs (15.4 kg)

settings.title: Front View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
The Dell 5820 Workstation Tower is equipped with a versatile array of ports, ensuring seamless connectivity for diverse professional needs.

1. Power button/Power light
2. Drive activity light
3. SD card slot
4. USB 3.1 Gen 1 ports
5. USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-C port with PowerShare
6. USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-C port
7. Headset port
8. 5.25 inch bay (optional)
9. Optical drive
10. Drive access release latch
11. Drive carriers

settings.title: Rear View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
The Dell 5820 Workstation Tower is equipped with a versatile array of ports, ensuring seamless connectivity for diverse professional needs.

12. Microphone/Line-in port
13. PS/2 Mouse port
14. USB 3.1 Gen 1 ports
15. Discrete graphics card slot (optional)
16. Padlock ring
17. Security cable slot
18. Power cable connector
19. Line-out port
20. Serial port
21. PS/2 Keyboard port
22. Network port
23. USB 3.1 Gen 1 port (supports smart Power-On)
24. Expansion card slots

settings.title: Monitors.com Exclusive Offer
settings.content:
When you purchase from Monitors.com, you not only receive a top-tier workstation but also benefit from our dedication to value and service. We understand the unique needs of healthcare professionals, and that's why we offer:
Advanced Hot Swap: Our Hot Swap capabilities ensure you can seamlessly switch out components without workflow disruption, guaranteeing uninterrupted productivity.

Next Business Day Standard Replacement: Count on our swift replacement service to keep your workstation running smoothly, minimizing downtime.

Free Shipping & Fast Delivery: We respect your time, offering free shipping and lightning-fast delivery to get you started with your workstation without delay.

Dedicated Support Team: Our team of experts is readily available to address any inquiries or issues, making your journey from purchase to setup as seamless as possible.

Competitive Pricing: At Monitors.com, we're committed to delivering exceptional value. You'll find our products competitively priced to fit comfortably within your budget.

Customer Satisfaction: Your contentment is our top priority, and we're dedicated to ensuring you're thrilled with your purchase. We're here to assist you at every step.

Invest in a Monitors.com workstation for not just top-tier hardware but a partnership committed to your success.
